DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy of the investigators PSU hip protector for prevention of fracture in elderly.The eligible patients include those with previous diagnosed as unilateral hip fracture. They will be randomized into 2 groups;psu hip protector and no protector. The patients will be instructed to wear the protector fulltime.The inceidence of hip fracture will be compared between both group at the end of 1 year.
DOC.brief_title: Hip Protector for Prevention of Hip Fracture
DOC.criteria: Patients with previous diagnosed as unilateral hip fracture Poor communicative ability Cannot independently ambulate Local skin problem at trocahnteric area
